item.title: Sabot in the Age of AI
item.description:
A captured screenshot of a page generated by a tarpit deployed as part of the ongoing â€˜Trapping AIâ€™ operation. The tarpit, built on Babble â€” a standalone LLM crawler-tarpit binary â€” generates an endless stream of deterministic bollocks that traps crawlers on a single site and forces them to endlessly navigate a constantly expanding sea of pages ğŸŒŠ. Each new page spawns additional layers of meaningless text and dozens of links, dragging them ever deeper into the tarpit ğŸ•³ï¸.
